The amount of detail achieved in this pen-and-ink piece is staggering! Likewise, the intense shading contrasting with subdued highlights is amazing! Drawing all those trees in the background must've taken months1 I can not only see windows on the structures, but doors and battlements. The bridge in the center left shows perfect stereotomy with no need for mortar. The man's gaiters are perfectly laced. The rocks in the foreground show perfect balance of highlight and shade. The only thing I find disturbing about this piece is the condition of the dogs in front. They all look emaciated, and the one sitting under the horse has a sad, sick expression. I understand they are hunting dogs that live off their kills, but these pups won't live long in their current condition.
